issue.title: [Python] Expose Decimal128Type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1845](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1845). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the course of the renaming, we forgot to update the Python code to the new `Decimal128Type`, thus master is currently failing.

comments.body:
